column4: text
I'll make you pay for this.
You influenced the fate of Essi for your simple intentions?
You! Here!
What an indelicate way to welcome an acquaintance.
Do you have anything to do with what happened to Essi?
Me?
Have I ever had anything to do with someone's doom…
Even a being like me can't be sure how things will turn out if left to their own devices.
This poor girl could represent a different path for your destiny.
This would have upset me.
And I don't like to be upset.
In this type of situation,
it can happen that I give a helping hand to fate
to make sure that it will not come to disturb my intentions…
I'll make you pay for this.
It's a challenge?
I like challenges.
But I'm of a different kind from the monsters you ox in your wanderings.
You can't do anything against me.
I will find a way.
Don't exhaust yourself too much unnecessarily… I could still need your services.
Don't worry, we'll meet again…
But only when I'll decide.
You influenced the fate of Essi for your simple "intentions"?
It's just a side effect.
My acts are simply guided by my interests.
